title: Aged Dependent Relative visa
summary: This page provides detailed information about the Subclass 838 Aged Dependent Relative visa. It explains eligibility requirements, costs, processing times, application conditions, and what applicants can do once they hold this permanent visa. It also includes rules about travel validity, sponsorship, family inclusion, and application processing changes starting 23 July 2025.

structured_data.description: This visa lets a single older person stay in Australia permanently if they rely on a relative living in Australia for financial support.

key_updates.import_limitations: Some existing applications made outside Australia before 25 June 2020 cannot be imported into ImmiAccount.

what_you_can_do_with_this_visa: Sponsor relatives to come to Australia
Attend free English language classes under the Adult Migrant English Program, if eligible
Apply for Australian citizenship, if eligible

travel_rules: Unlimited travel in and out of Australia during validity
After 5 years, must obtain a Resident Return Visa (RRV) to re-enter Australia as a permanent resident
Australian citizenship removes the need for a visa to re-enter Australia

application_conditions.apply_from: Applicant must be in Australia but not in immigration clearance both at application and decision time
application_conditions.family_members_apply_from: Family members applying with the applicant must also be in Australia and not in immigration clearance

include_family.when: Anytime before a decision is made
requirements: Must provide details of all family members, whether migrating or not
Family members must meet health and character requirements

additional_costs: Extra charge for each family member applying
tools: Visa Pricing Estimator (does not include second instalment or other costs)

notes: Times shown are for recently decided applications and are not specific to individual applications
processing_times.queue_information: Applications are subject to capping and queueing

visa_label.linking_method: Visa is digitally linked to passport

sponsor_requirement.details: Must be sponsored by an eligible relative or the relative's partner; sponsorship must be approved

eligibility.age_requirement: Must be old enough to receive the age pension in Australia

dependency_requirement.description: Must have been dependent on the relative in Australia for basic needs such as food, shelter, and clothing for at least the last 3 years
dependency_requirement.alternative: Dependency may be due to disability preventing work

assurance_of_support.details: Assures the government the applicant will not rely on public assistance; applies to the applicant and any migrating family members
assurance_of_support.notification: The department will inform the applicant when to obtain the assurance

eligibility.health_requirement: Applicant and any applying family members must meet the health requirement

help_with_visa.advice: Read information on who can help with your visa application before paying someone

additional_notes.reports_reference: Reports on Migration Programs provide details on outcomes against planning levels
